name: Marinatide
description: Marinatide is a sea fishing and exploration game, combining elements of strategy and adventure. Roam the sea, catch fish and complete the quest to fishing glory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 9800 GT or Intel / AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
